headline: Themes ETFs Launches China Generative AI ETF on Cboe (Ticker: DRGN)
summary: The global AI race is intensifying. Backed by national policy and major R&D investment, China’s generative AI sector is rapidly scaling, fueling investor interest in the country’s next wave of innovation.DRGN is the 19th low-cost ETF added to the firm’s lineup of thematic and fundamental funds.
